title: PredictTV
description: Users join leagues and invite friends/foes to see who can best predict how long new TV shows will last.

title: Gimme Five
description: Users can get help with ideas or decisions, by making lists then submiting them to the community for comments and voting.

title: The Initials Game
description: A game where users are given the initals of a famous person, then have to guess who those initials belong to.

title: My Portfolio
description: A game where users are given the initals of famous people, then have to guess who those initials belong to.
